label: 蕃別
対訳語: clan (uji) descended from some Chinese or Korean immigrant.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Clan Chieftains (Uji-no-kami) of such clans frequently had the hereditary titles (kabane) of Kishi or Sukuri.　See also 諸蕃　しょばん shoban
